data.title: The Greatest Czech Film & Theater Personalities
data.meta_description: The World would have been much poorer without these famous Czech Film & Theater Personalities!
data.text:
1

Miloš Forman

(Best Known for Directing the 1975 Psychological Comedy Drama Film 'One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest')

16

3

Birthdate: February 18, 1932

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Čáslav, Czechia

Died: April 13, 2018

Miloš Forman was a Czech and American screenwriter, film director, actor, and professor. He is remembered for directing the 1975 psychological comedy drama film One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, which became the second film to receive all five major Oscars. During his career, Forman won two Oscars, a César Award, and three Golden Globe Awards among other prestigious awards.

2

Karolína Kurková

(Czech Actress and Model Known for Her Work as a Former ‘Victoria's Secret Angel’)

16

3

Birthdate: February 28, 1984

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Děčín, Czech Republic

Karolína Kurková is a Czech-American actress and model best known for being a former Victoria's Secret Angel. Praised by the bigwigs of the modeling industry for her skills as a model, Kurková was counted among the world's highest-paid models by 2007. Also known for her humanitarian work, Kurková was honored by Women Together, a non-profit organization, in 2006.

3

Little Caprice

(Czech Porn Star)

13

2

Birthdate: October 26, 1988

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Brno, Czechoslovakia

Little Caprice is a Czech model, pornographic actress, and producer. Over the course of her career, Caprice has received many nominations for the prestigious AVN Award and has won the award on a couple of occasions. She has also received a couple of XBIZ Awards in her career so far.

Recommended Lists:

4

Lída Baarová

(Czech Actress Who was the Mistress of the Nazi Propaganda Minister Joseph Goebbels)

12

3

Birthdate: September 14, 1914

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: October 28, 2000

Lída Baarová was a Czech actress whose professional life was overshadowed by her personal counterpart; she is best remembered as the mistress of Joseph Goebbels, a Nazi propaganda minister. Her life and career inspired the 2016 film The Devil's Mistress, a dramatization of Lída Baarová's life, in which Baarová was played by Slovak actress Tatiana Pauhofová.

Recommended Lists:

5

Karel Roden

(Czech Actor Known for His Roles in the Films: 'The Bourne Supremacy' and 'Hellboy')

11

2

Birthdate: May 18, 1962

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Ceske Budejovice, Czechia

Karel Roden is a Czech actor best known for his performances in films like The Bourne Supremacy and Hellboy. Over the course of his acting career, Roden has received several prestigious awards such as the Czech Lion Award and Alfréd Radok Award. Karel Roden is also known for his voice work in the popular video game, Grand Theft Auto IV.

6

Vladimir Kulich

(Czech-Canadian Actor Best Known for His Role in the Film 'The 13th Warrior')

9

4

Birthdate: July 14, 1956

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Vladimir Kulich is a Czech-Canadian actor best known for his portrayal of Buliwyf in the 1999 American historical action film, The 13th Warrior. He has also appeared in popular TV series like Vikings. Prior to his acting career, Vladimir Kulich played professional ice hockey and tried his hand at many other things, including a whitewater river rafting business.

7

Yana Gupta

(Czech Actress and Model Known For Her Work in Indian Films)

12

2

Birthdate: April 23, 1979

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Brno, Czechia

Yana Gupta is a Czech actress and model. She is best known for her work in Indian films like Anniyan, Manmadhan, and Murder 2. Apart from appearing in films, Gupta also appears in popular Indian TV reality shows like Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa.

8

Jan Švankmajer

(Former Czech Artist and Filmmaker Famous For His Stop-Motion Animation Work)

9

2

Birthdate: September 4, 1934

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Jan Švankmajer is a Czech former artist and filmmaker. A self-proclaimed surrealist, Švankmajer's stop-motion animation work has greatly influenced artists like Brothers Quay, Terry Gilliam, Caroline Leaf, Vera Neubauer, Nina Gantz, and Tomasz Bagiński among many others. Jan Švankmajer is a recipient of many prestigious awards such as the Golden Bear, FIAF Award, and Raymond Roussel Society Medal.

9

Alena Šeredová

(Czech Actress and Model)

11

2

Birthdate: March 21, 1978

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Prague, Czech Republic

Alena Šeredová is a Czech actress and model best known for her work in Italy. Over the years, Šeredová has appeared on the covers of popular magazines like Playboy Europe, Penthouse Europe, Quo, and Spy. Her popularity increased in 2011 when she got married to Italian goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon; they separated in May 2014.

10

Vera Ralston

(Czech Figure-Skater Who Competed in 1936-Winter-Olympics and Known for Her Role in the Film 'Dakota')

8

1

Birthdate: July 12, 1919

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: February 9, 2003

Czech figure-skater Vera Ralston represented her nation under her birth name Věra Hrubá at the 1936 European Figure Skating Championships, the 1936 Winter Olympics, and the 1937 European Figure Skating Championships. She later immigrated to the US and became a naturalized citizen. She made her name as an actress appearing in films like Storm Over Lisbon, Dakota, and The Fighting Kentuckian.

11

George Voskovec

(Czech Actor Best Known for His Role in the Film '12 Angry Men')

7

1

Birthdate: June 19, 1905

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Sázava, Czechia

Died: July 1, 1981

George Voskovec was a Czech actor, dramatist, writer, and director. He acted in 72 films, out of which only the first five were Czech and the rest were either American or English. In the USA, George Voskovec became known for his portrayal of Juror 11 in the 1957 courtroom drama film 12 Angry Men.

12

Anny Ondra

(Czech Actress Who Appeared in Czech, Austrian, French, German, and English films.)

6

1

Birthdate: May 15, 1903

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Tarnow, Poland

Died: February 28, 1987

Anny Ondra was a Czech film actress who appeared in Czech, Austrian, French, German, and English films. Apart from her popular acting career, Ondra was also known for her much publicized wedding and marriage life with boxing champion Max Schmeling. Anny Ondra was played by Peta Wilson in the 2002 American-German boxing film Joe and Max.

13

Jan Rubeš

(Czech-Canadian Actor and Bass Opera Singer)

9

1

Birthdate: June 6, 1920

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Volyně, Czechoslovakia

Died: June 29, 2009

Jan Rubeš was a Czech-Canadian actor and bass opera singer. He first achieved popularity in 1948 when he performed at the Geneva International Music Festival and won the first prize. Jan Rubeš went on to appear in many films and TV series and won the prestigious Earle Grey Award in 1990.

14

Dolly Buster

(Retired Czech-German Porn Star)

7

3

Birthdate: October 23, 1969

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Prague, Czech Republic

Dolly Buster is a Czech-German author, filmmaker, and retired pornographic actress. She appeared in more than 100 X-rated European movies and was named the hottest porn star in Germany in 2009. Dolly Buster also has a Lifetime Achievement Award, presented at the Venus Awards, and a Special Jury Award under her belt. Buster has also written a series of crime-novels.

15

Tatana Kucharova

(The First Contestant from the Czech Republic to win the Miss World Title)

8

1

Birthdate: December 23, 1987

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Trnava, Czechoslovakia

Tatana Kucharova is a Czech beauty queen and model. She achieved national recognition in 2006 when she made history by becoming the first contestant from the Czech Republic to win the Miss World title. Tatana Kucharova went on to appear in popular TV shows such as StarDance, where she finished second in 2013.

16

Libuše Šafránková

(Actress)

6

1

Birthdate: June 7, 1953

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Brno, Czechoslovakia

Height: 5'7" (170 cm)

17

David Nykl

(Best Known for His Role in the SciFi Series 'Stargate Atlantis' and DC Comic Series 'Arrow')

6

2

Birthdate: February 7, 1967

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Czechia

Czech-born actor David Nykl was 2 when he moved to Canada with his parents and later began his acting career with small roles in community theater and television in Vancouver. He is, perhaps, best known for his portrayal of Radek Zelenka in the sci-fi series Stargate: Atlantis.

18

Tereza Srbova

(Czech Model and Actress)

7

1

Birthdate: June 23, 1983

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Tereza Srbova is a Czech model, writer, and actress. She is best known for her work in films like Eastern Promises and Red Joan. Srbova made her short film debut as a writer and director in the 2017 film Meanders, which was honored at the Ischia Global Film Festival. Srbova also published her first graphic novel titled Sidonie in 2021.

19

Barbora Kodetova

(Czech Actress Best Known for Her Role in the TV Miniseries 'Frank Herbert's Dune')

5

1

Birthdate: September 6, 1970

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Best known for her portrayal of Chani in the miniseries Dune and its sequel, Children of Dune, Czech actor Barbora Kodetová is also a mother of three. The actor is married to renowned Czech violinist Pavel Šporcl. Audiences also know her for her portrayal of Lady Marke in Tristan & Isolde.

20

Edgar G. Ulmer

(Hollywood Director, Known for His Low-Budget or B-Movies of Horror and Noir Genres)

5

1

Birthdate: September 17, 1904

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Olomouc, Czechia

Died: September 30, 1972

Known for pioneering the Hollywood B-film, or low-budget film productions, director Edgar G. Ulmer was the man behind movies such as The Black Cat. Initially a stage production designer for Max Reinhardt, he later mostly explored the noir, drama, and horror genres as a director.

21

Jan Triska

(Best Known for His Films 'Lunacy', 'Rád' and 'Up and Down')

6

1

Birthdate: November 4, 1936

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Died: September 25, 2017

Czech-born actor Jan Triska, who later moved to the US, was know for his roles in films such as Ronin, Lunacy, and Up and Down. The 3-time Czech Lion-nominated actor moved back to the Czech Republic after the 1989 Velvet Revolution. He also delivered an award-winning performance in a production of King Lear.

22

Věra Chytilová

(Czech Avant-Garde Film Director)

5

1

Birthdate: February 2, 1929

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Ostrava, Czechia

Died: March 12, 2014

One of the pioneering directors of Czech New Wave cinema, Czech Lion winner Věra Chytilová mingled elements of avant-garde, feminism, and cinema verite in her movies. Initially a student of philosophy and architecture, she had worked as a designer and model before plunging into direction. Daisies remains one of her best-known movies.

23

Hugo Haas

(Czech Actor, Writer, and Director)

4

1

Birthdate: February 19, 1901

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Brno, Moravia, Austria-Hungary

Died: December 1, 1968

24

Anna Geislerova

(Czech Actress Known for Her Double Role 'Eliška/Hana' in the Movie 'Želary')

6

1

Birthdate: April 17, 1976

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Czech actor Anna Geislerova was 14 when she soared to fame with her debut film, Requiem for a Doll. The 5-time Czech Lion-winning actor has also been a famous model in the past. She is, perhaps, best known for her double role of Eliška/Hana in Želary.

25

Jeanette Sterke

(Known for Her Films 'Lust for Life', 'Live Now, Pay Later' and 'Moments')

6

2

Birthdate: March 25, 1933

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

A popular face on British TV in the 1970s, Czech-born English actor Jeanette Sterke soared to fame with series and mini-series such as My Brother Tom. She later appeared in movies such as The Prisoner and The Nun's Story. Married to actor Keith Michell, she has also appeared in plays with him.

26

Jan Werich

(Czech Playwright & Actor Who Created Successful Left-Wing Political Satires)

6

1

Birthdate: February 6, 1905

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Smíchov, Prague, Czechia

Died: October 31, 1980

Jan Werich was a Czech playwright, actor, and writer. He is best remembered for his partnership with Jaroslav Ježek and Jiří Voskovec as the trio produced many successful left-wing political satires. After World War II, which forced the trio to move to the USA, Werich returned to his homeland and started working alongside personalities like Jiří Trnka and Miroslav Horníček.

27

Jiří Trnka

(Czech Filmmaker and Puppet-Maker Regarded as 'Walt Disney of Eastern Europe')

4

1

Birthdate: February 24, 1912

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Pilsen, Czechia

Died: December 30, 1969

Trained as a painter, Jiří Trnka later worked as a puppet maker and an illustrator for children’s books. He later made several animation films, and eventually focused solely on puppet films, such as The Czech Year and A Midsummer Night’s Dream. He often used tales by Czech folklore authors in his films.

28

Jaroslava Schallerová

(Czech Actress Known for Her Debut New Wave Cinema 'Valerie and Her Week of Wonders')

4

1

Birthdate: April 25, 1956

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Czech actor Jaroslava Schallerová was 13 when she made her debut with the film Valerie and Her Week of Wonders. She was quite a rage in the 1970s and continued her acting career well into the 1990s. Die Elixiere des Teufels and Malá mořská víla were 2 of her notable movies.

29

Karel Dobry

(Known for 'Dune', 'Children of Dune', 'Mission: Impossible' and 'The Girl of Your Dreams')

4

1

Birthdate: May 2, 1969

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Karlovy Vary, Czechia

Alfred Radok Award- and Theater News Award-winning Czech actor Karel Dobrý is best known for his roles in the movie Mission: Impossible and the miniseries Dune. He is a fan of fast cars and is also an avid horseman, who performs his own stunts. His role in Hastrman won him a Czech Lion.

30

Božena Němcová

(Czech Writer Best Known For Her Novel 'Babička')

5

1

Birthdate: February 4, 1820

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Vienna, Austria

Died: January 21, 1862

Božena Němcová was a Czech writer who was active during the Czech National Revival movement. She is best remembered for her 1855 novel Babička (The Grandmother), which was inspired by her own childhood in the Ratibořice village where she spent most of her time with her maternal grandmother, Magdalena Novotná. Božena Němcová's image is portrayed on the 500 CZK currency note.

31

Jana Brejchova

(Actress)

4

1

Birthdate: January 20, 1940

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

32

Václav Marhoul

(Best Known for His War Films Such as 'The Painted Bird' and 'Tobruk')

5

1

Birthdate: January 30, 1960

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Czech director and screenwriter Václav Marhoul is best known for his popular films such as the war drama The Painted Bird and Tobruk. He has also appeared in several films, such as the comedy movie Gympl. He is also the father of actor Anna Marhoulová.

37

Ivan Kral

(Czech-Born Musician and Songwriter Who Was a Major Figure of the 1970s' Rock Scene)

3

1

Birthdate: May 12, 1948

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Died: February 2, 2020

Apart from being a significant figure of New York’s underground rock scene, Czech-born musician and songwriter Ivan Kral was also a talented filmmaker. He co-wrote and worked as a guitarist and bassist for a number of artists, such as Patti Smith. He also recorded a few film scores.

38

Zorka Janů

(Czech Actress Who Committed Suicide After Being Ostracized Due to Her Sister's Nazi Connection)

4

1

Birthdate: July 9, 1921

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Štěchovice, Czech Republic

Died: March 24, 1946

Zorka Janů, the younger sister of actor Lída Baarová, was 12 when she appeared in Brickmaker's Daughter, along with Lida. She later soared to fame with movies such as Pacientka Dr. Hegla and Fiery Summer. She eventually died by suicide after being expelled from work for her sister’s association with a Nazi leader.

39

Miroslav Ondricek

(Cinematographer)

3

1

Birthdate: November 4, 1934

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: March 28, 2015

40

Vlastimil Brodsky

(Actor)

3

0

Birthdate: December 15, 1920

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Hrušov, Czechia

Died: April 20, 2002

41

Gustav Machatý

(Director)

2

0

Birthdate: May 9, 1901

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: December 13, 1963

42

Tereza Voříšková

(Actress)

3

1

Birthdate: June 29, 1989

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Height: 5'9" (175 cm)

43

Marek Vašut

(Actor)

3

0

Birthdate: May 5, 1960

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Prague, Czech Republic

Height: 6'1" (185 cm)

44

Ivan Mládek

(Legendary Czech Composer and Musician Who Is Known for His Comedy)

3

1

Birthdate: February 7, 1942

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

While initially trained in painting, Czech composer and musician Ivan Mládek later switched to music. A cultural icon in his country, he became known for his funny tracks and, later, for his comedy. He also designed the Guitariano and played minor roles in a few Czech films.

45

Eva Doležalová

(Director, Producer)

3

1

Birthdate: May 5, 1991

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Prague, Czech Republic

Height: 5'9" (175 cm)

46

Lea De Mae

(Czech Pornographic Actress and Adult Model)

6

1

Birthdate: December 26, 1976

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Prague, Czechoslovakia

Died: December 9, 2004

Lea De Mae was a Czech diver, pornographic actress, and adult model. She was part of the high diving national team before injuring her spine while training for the 1996 Olympics. After retiring from professional sports, Lea De Mae appeared in more than 80 adult films. She died at age 27 after suffering from an aggressive form of brain cancer.

47

Lyda Salmonova

(Actress)

2

0

Birthdate: July 14, 1889

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Prague, Czechia

Died: November 18, 1968

48

Frank Daniel

(Screenwriter)

3

1

Birthdate: April 14, 1926

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Kolin, Czechia

Died: March 29, 1996

49

Nikola Ristanovski

(Actor)

3

0

Birthdate: January 23, 1969

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Ostrava, Czech Republic
